# iosxe_pim_ipv6 (Data Source)

This data source can read the PIM IPv6 configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxe_pim_ipv6" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `rp_address` (String)
- `rp_address_access_list` (String)
- `rp_address_bidir` (Boolean) Specify keyword bidir to configure a bidir RP
- `vrfs` (Attributes List) Select VPN Routing/Forwarding instance (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--vrfs))

<a id="nestedatt--vrfs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `vrfs`

Read-Only:

- `rp_address` (String)
- `rp_address_access_list` (String)
- `rp_address_bidir` (Boolean) Specify keyword bidir to configure a bidir RP
- `vrf` (String)
